description.displayText: Melinda was our nanny from the time our daughter was 18 months old until she started kindergarten at age 5. Melinda was like a member of our family. She was always providing our daughter with interesting educational experiences, and never did screen time with our daughter or spent time on her phone. We trusted her to fly with our daughter to our parent's homes, to spend the weekend with our daughter, and we even allowed our daughter to do a sleepover at Melinda's home. She is completely trustworthy--we provided her with a credit card and she was careful to keep receipts for all expenses. Even after she stopped being our nanny, we still asked that she care for our child on numerous occasions. She has even come to take our daughter out to dinner, unpaid!!! We paid a lot for a nanny matching service and you would be lucky to have her without the fee.

description.displayText: Melinda worked with our family and provided exceptional service to our infant son. I was cloth diapering and breastfeeding and she was well-versed with both of these. She provided educational stimulation to our son, which set him up for success when he transitioned to Montessori school. She communicated well with our entire family and sent photo updates to my husband/me and the grandparents. She became an essential part of our family and would hire her again for our new baby if we didn't move so far out of the city limits.

description.displayText: Exceptional ability with child care. Went far and beyond to help my young family when we struggled to calm our newborn. She tutored on us on how to pacify a colicky baby, feeding, sleeping and otherwise. She was just a dependable mother you can leave your child with and have peace of mind. We only parted ways because we moved but definitely miss her.
